question: One of our Prime Ministers , Mr. IK Gujral had propounded a doctrine in early nineties which has come to be known as “Gujral Doctrine”. Which among the following statements gives an economic essence of Gujral Doctrine?
option1: India viewed the South Asian Region as one economic entity and emphasizes on the multilateral trade concessions
option2: India offered to create a South Asia Free Trade Region with this doctrine
option3: India offered to sign Free Trade Agreements with its smaller neighbors and was successful in signing such an agreement with Sri Lanka
option4: India offered unilateral concessions and benefits to all its neighbors, without expecting them to make reciprocal gestures to India
answer: India offered unilateral concessions and benefits to all its neighbors, without expecting them to make reciprocal gestures to India
